facade

Class CompanyFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facade.CompanyFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    public class CompanyFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    This class is a part of the facade pattern layer. The class which manages the company user's request for using methods with company functionality after a successful login. The class uses the methods of the CompanyDBDAO and the Coupon DBDAO classes - which communicates with the data base. In addition, this class also catches any related exceptions that might occur.
    Version:
    1.0 February 20, 2017.
    Author:
    Ehud Perlman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CompanyFacade()
      Constructs the class of the company facade and creating new relevant DBDAO objects for the use of the facade with the DBDAO objects.

      • CompanyFacade

        public CompanyFacade()

    • Method Detail

      • createCoupon

        public void createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
        This method activates the createCoupon method in the couponDBDAO class while sending the received coupon parameter, eventually creating the coupon's record into the Mysql data base. The coupon is recorded as the coupon of the logged in company.
        Parameters:
        coupon - - the coupon object that is filled with the fields of the coupon to eventually add to the data base.

      • removeCoupon

        public void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
        This method activates the removeCoupon method in the couponDBDAO class while sending the received coupon parameter, eventually removing the coupon's record from the Mysql data base.
        Parameters:
        coupon - - the coupon object that is filled with the fields of the coupon to eventually remove from the data base.

      • updateCoupon

        public void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
        This method activates the updateCoupon method in the couponDBDAO class while sending the received coupon parameter, eventually updating the coupon's record in the Mysql data base.
        Parameters:
        coupon - - the coupon object that is filled with the fields of the coupon to eventually update in data base.

      • getCoupon

        public Coupon getCoupon(long id)
        This method activates the getCoupon method in the couponDBDAO class while sending the received coupon id parameter, eventually getting and returning a Coupon object.
        Parameters:
        id - - the id of the coupon, like it's on the data base, so that we will receive a coupon object from the record in the data base by it's id.
        Returns:
        couponDBDAO.getCoupon(id) - returning a Coupon object from the coupon's record in the Mysql data base.

      • getAllCoupons

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getAllCoupons()
        This method activates the getAllCoupons method in the couponDBDAO, eventually getting and returning an Array List of Coupon objects.
        Returns:
        companyDBDAO.getCoupons() - returning an Array List of all the Coupon objects of the logged in company from records in the Mysql data base

      • getCouponsByType

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByType(CouponType ct)
        The method uses the getCoupons method in the companyDBDAO, so it will receive all the coupons of the company, and after that, will make a new Array list of only the company coupons of the specific entered type.
        Parameters:
        ct - - the coupon type that the method will use, to get only company coupons of this type.
        Returns:
        allCouponsByType - the array list of Coupon of all the companys coupons of this type only.

      • getCouponsByPrice

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByPrice(double price)
        The method uses the getCoupons method in the companyDBDAO, so it will receive all the coupons of the company, and after that, will make a new Array list of only the company's coupons at the specific price, or below it.
        Parameters:
        price - - the coupon price that the method will use, to get only company coupons at this price, or below it.
        Returns:
        allCompanyCouponsByPrice - the array list of Coupon of all the company's coupons of at this price or below it.

      • getCouponsByDate

        public java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsByDate(java.util.Date date)
        The method uses the getCoupons method in the companyDBDAO, so it will receive all the coupons of the company, and after that, will make a new Array list of only the company's coupons that their end date is at the date received or before it.
        Parameters:
        date - - the coupon's date that the method will use, to get only company coupons that their end date is at this date, or before it.
        Returns:
        allCompanyCouponsByDate - the array list of Coupon of all the company's coupons that that their end date is at this date, or before it.

      • login

        public CouponClientFacade login(java.lang.String compName,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                ClientType clientType)
        The login method for the company client type user. After receiving the parameters, while the clientType is of company kind, it calls the login method in companyDBDAO and there checks the credentials and if the login is successful, it receives true value in the result boolean and then returns CouponClientFacade of the type CompanyFacade and the user can start using the company different methods. if the login is unsuccessful, the facade is not returned.
        Specified by:
        login in interface CouponClientFacade
        Parameters:
        compName - - - the user name of the user company that wants to log in.
        password - - the password of the user that wants to log in.
        clientType - - the client type of the user that wants to log in.
        Returns:
        login - returns the CouponClientFacade object of CompanyFacade kind, or a null value.
